name: Ernest's UFO Adventure
description:
Fly an UFO as Ernest the alien! Avoid the ever-hungry ghosts who are willing to eat you in this 2D Endless Runner! Play in fullscreen mode for the best experience!

Use the arrow keys or the on-screen controls to move. Arrow keys are recommended. There are four different characters that will be randomly picked for you each round you play. They are:

  • Ernest, the green alien
  • Ethan, the pink alien
  • Caleb, the beige alien
  • Jethro, the blue alien
  • Gabriel, the yellow alien

Have fun playing with them!

This game does not work on mobile. Consider using the Google Play version. (Link below)

This is a WebGL version of Ernest's UFO Adventure, originally made for mobile devices. This game has no advertisements, compared to the Google Play version as WebGL does not support advertisements. 

Credits:

  • kenney.nl for art assets
  • dl-sounds.com for music
  • You-tuber Blackthornpod for tutorials
